00042         #include "StdAfx.h"
00043         // To prevent problems using iostream later...

00045             #error "You must include '<iostream>' in your 'StdAfx.h' file."
00046         #endif

00213 namespace Omiscid {
00214 
00215 
00216 // Trace management
00217 #ifdef OMISCID_TRACE_ENABLE
00218     #define OMISCID_TRACE_IS_ENABLED 1
00219 #else
00220     #define OMISCID_TRACE_IS_ENABLED 0
00221 #endif
00222 
00226 inline void OmiscidError(const char * format, ... )
00227 {
00228     va_list args;
00229     va_start( args, format );
00230     vfprintf( stderr, format, args );
00231     va_end( args );
00232 }
00233 
00234 inline void OmiscidTrace(const char * format, ... )
00235 {
00236     va_list args;
00237     va_start( args, format );
00238 #ifdef DEBUG
00239     vfprintf( stderr, format, args );
00240 #else
00241     vprintf( format, args );
00242 #endif
00243     va_end( args );
00244 }
00245 
00246 #define OmiscidError  !(OMISCID_TRACE_IS_ENABLED) ? (void)0 : OmiscidError
00247 #define OmiscidTrace  !(OMISCID_TRACE_IS_ENABLED) ? (void)0 : OmiscidTrace
00248 
00249 // Message for developping purpose
00250 #ifdef DEBUG
00251     #define DevOmiscidTrace OmiscidError
00252 #else
00253     inline void DevOmiscidTrace( const char * format, ... ) {}
00254 #endif
00255 
00256 // Define an OmiscidMessage depend on DEBUG flag but always doing a trace
00257 #ifdef DEBUG
00258     #define OmiscidMessage OmiscidError
00259 #else
00260     #define OmiscidMessage OmiscidTrace
00261 #endif
